Name: Thomas
description:
Thomas, as many coffee farmers, is very curious. They are continuously searching and innovating to decrease production costs, buy at the same time ensure the best coffee quality production.

Thomas saw that his neighbors installed a Sistema.bio digester in their farms and he saw how the biodigester was making amazing changes in their crops. The cow manure was transformed into a very potent and organic fertilizer and biogas (clean and renewable energy) through the biodigester.

Thomas wants to buy his own biodigester to reduce his reliance on expensive and non-renewable agrochemical fertilizers to increase the quality of his vegetables, processing the manure from his cows, helping both his wallet and the environment.

This loan represents 100% of the price of the biodigester.
